column4: AHHHH!!  I upgraded from Breezy to Dapper and now when I put up I just get a blank screen after it runs through the boot, I can only get to a command prompt through safemode, what happened?
Is there anywhere brick and mortar right now where you can BUY the Dapper Drake CD?
probably not. But you can have them ship you the CD's if you go to the website
